Enabled.Name: Enable World Artificer UI
Enabled.Hint: This will disable client-side Artificer UI settings and enable the World Artificer UI settings. This will allow the GM to set the Artificer UI settings for all players in the world. If disabled, the client-side settings will be used.
Enabled.Warning: The settings for this module are being controlled by the GM. If you wish to change these settings, please contact your GM.

Glass.Name: Enable Glassmorphism
Glass.Hint: Enable the glassmorphism theme. This will make the UI elements transparent and blur the background. WARNING: This may cause performance issues on some systems.

Opacity.Name: Glassmorphism Opacity
Opacity.Hint: Set the opacity of the glassmorphism effect. This will make the UI elements more or less transparent.

Blur.Name: Glassmorphism Blur
Blur.Hint: Set the blur of the glassmorphism effect. This will make the background more or less blurry.

Color.Name: Theme Color
Color.Hint: This will override the light/dark theme colors with a custom color. This will affect all UI elements enabled for use with Artificer UI. Please note to return to default, just clear the input field.

Theme.Name: Enable Artificer UI Sidebar Theme
Theme.Hint: This will apply the Artificer UI theme to the sidebar. This will override the default Foundry/System theme for the sidebar.

AutoHide.Name: Automatically Hide the Sidebar
AutoHide.Hint: This will cause the sidebar to automatically slide out of view when not active. On hover, it will slide back into view.

DefaultTab.Name: The Default Sidebar Tab on Render
DefaultTab.Hint: Choose the default tab that should be opened when the sidebar is rendered.

Enabled.Name: Enable Popout Chat
Enabled.Hint: This will popout the chat and dock it to the left of the screen.

AutoHide.Name: Automatically Hide the Chat
AutoHide.Hint: This will cause the chat to automatically slide out of view when not active. On hover, it will slide back into view.

NewChat.Name: Show Chat On New Messages
NewChat.Hint: When a new message is recieved, tha chat will automatically slide into view.

Combat.Name: Show Chat In Combat
Combat.Hint: When combat starts, the chat will automatically slide into view.

Enabled.Name: Enable Controls
Enabled.Hint: Enable the controls for the sidebar.

HideLogo.Name: Hide Logo
HideLogo.Hint: It is recommended to hide the logo if you are docking the controls to the top of the screen. As Systems change this logo, it may not always be the same size or shape. Making it hard to dock the controls around the logo.

Dock.Name: Dock Controls To
Dock.Hint: Choose where the controls should be docked.

Position.Name: Position
Position.Hint: Choose the position of the controls.

Style.Name: Style
Style.Hint: Choose the style of the controls.

Enabled.Name: Enable Player Widget
Enabled.Hint: This will enable the custom Player List widget for Artificer UI.

Enabled.Name: Enable Scene Widget
Enabled.Hint: This will enable the custom Scene List widget for Artificer UI.

Enabled.Name: Enable Hotbar Widget
Enabled.Hint: This will enable the custom Hotbar widget for Artificer UI.

Enabled.Name: Enable Sheets Widget
Enabled.Hint: This will show opened windows in the Artificer UI Taskbar. Similar to using the Taskbar in Windows for switching between open applications.
